name: active_boost
description: Use when bold action designator exists.

name: additional_action_1
description: Use when a card let you take additional action. Not when it let you immediately take action.

name: additional_action_2
description: Use when a card let you take additional action. Not when it let you immediately take action.

name: additional_action_3
description: Use when a card let you take additional action. Not when it let you immediately take action.

name: additional_clue_1
description: Use for exactly additional clue from the location you are investigating, not when it gets more from other locations.

name: additional_clue_2
description: Use for exactly additional clue from the location you are investigating, not when it gets more from other locations.

name: additional_clue_3
description: Use for exactly additional clue from the location you are investigating, not when it gets more from other locations.

name: additional_slot_hand
description: Provides additional hand slots.

name: additional_slot_tome
description: Provides additional hand slots specifically for Tome assets.

name: any_investigator
description: Can target anyone's things regardless of location.

name: aoe_damage
description: Multiple enemies at the same location takes damage, or one enemy at different locations takes damage.

name: aoe_evade
description: Multiple enemies at the same location are evaded, or one enemy at different locations are evaded.

name: auto_evade
description: Some card that provide auto_evade might not be testless_evade, such as Throw the Book at Them

name: auto_success
description: Cause the test to be automatically successful.

name: between_scenarios
description: Effect triggers when you are not playing.

name: bless_add
description: Able to increase bless count in the bag, except by releasing.

name: bless_remove
description: Able to reduce bless count in the bag, except by sealing.

name: bless_return
description: Can return bless back, like Sacred Covenant

name: bless_revealed
description: Effect check if bless tokens are revealed.

name: bless_seal
description: Can seal bless tokens.

name: blurse_conversion
description: Can exchage bless / curse. Tides of Fate.

name: blurse_revealed
description: Offer advantage revealing both kind of tokens. Offer choices revealing either kind of tokens.

name: bold_engage
description: Use when bold action designator exists.

name: bold_evade
description: Use when bold action designator exists.

name: bold_fight
description: Use when bold action designator exists.

name: bold_investigate
description: Use when bold action designator exists.

name: bold_parley
description: Use when bold action designator exists.

name: bold_resign
description: Use when bold action designator exists.

name: boost_agility_1_passive
description: Passive boost can be conditioned such as The Black Fan or Dissection Tool.

name: boost_agility_2_passive
description: Passive boost can be conditioned such as The Black Fan or Dissection Tool.

name: boost_combat_1_passive
description: Passive boost can be conditioned such as The Black Fan or Dissection Tool.

name: boost_combat_2_passive
description: Passive boost can be conditioned such as The Black Fan or Dissection Tool.

name: boost_intellect_1_passive
description: Passive boost can be conditioned such as The Black Fan or Dissection Tool.

name: boost_intellect_2_passive
description: Passive boost can be conditioned such as The Black Fan or Dissection Tool.

name: boost_willpower_1_passive
description: Passive boost can be conditioned such as The Black Fan or Dissection Tool.

name: boost_willpower_2_passive
description: Passive boost can be conditioned such as The Black Fan or Dissection Tool.

name: bottom_of_deck
description: Deal with bottom of any deck.

name: chaos_do_not_reveal
description: Will to Survive, Pnakotic Manuscript, Justify the Means.

name: chaos_ignore_effect
description: Usually ignored together with modifer.

name: chaos_ignore_modifier
description: Sometimes only modifier is ignored.

name: chaos_modifier
description: Sure Gamble, Hit Me!

name: chaos_resolve_choose
description: Grotesque Statue, Olive McBride.

name: chaos_reveal_during_effect
description: Effect timing related to chaos token revealing.

name: chaos_reveal_manual
description: Effect that instruct you to reveal tokens to determine result.

name: chaos_reveal_more_instead
description: Grotesque Statue, Olive McBride.

name: curse_add
description: Able to increase curse count in the bag.

name: curse_cost
description: Doesn't work unless you can add specified number of curse.

name: curse_defense
description: Offer protection from curse token, whether ignoring modifier or taking them out.

name: curse_revealed
description: Effect checks if curse tokens are revealed.

name: damage_redirect
description: Select new target for enemy's damage that's not simply soaking.

name: deal_damage_enemy
description: Card can deal damage to enemy.

name: deal_damage_investigator
description: Card can deal damage to investigator.

name: deck_restriction
description: Indicates the card can only be used in a specific investigator's deck.

name: difficulty_check_higher_2
description: Works or not depending on test's difficulty.

name: difficulty_decrease
description: Can decrease test difficulty, that is not shroud, evade, and fight.

name: difficulty_decrease_evade
description: Can decrease enemy's evade value.

name: difficulty_decrease_fight
description: Can decrease enemy's fight value.

name: difficulty_increase
description: Can decrease test difficulty, that is not shroud, evade, and fight.

name: difficulty_increase_evade
description: Can increase enemy's evade value.

name: difficulty_increase_fight
description: Can increase enemy's fight value.

name: difficulty_zero
description: Has a check whether difficulty of something is 0.

name: discard_card_choose
description: Effect discard cards from your hand. You can choose which.

name: discard_card_random
description: Effect discard cards from your hand, randomized.

name: discard_self
description: Somehow can discard itself.

name: discard_zero_uses
description: Discard itself when uses count runs out.

name: discount_1
description: Reduce play cost of other cards.

name: discount_2
description: Reduce play cost of other cards.

name: discount_3
description: Reduce play cost of other cards.

name: discover_clue_remote
description: Deciphered Reality. Use discover_clue_connecting_location_ first if possible

name: doom_add
description: Card can place doom on something.

name: doom_remove
description: Card can remove doom from something.

name: draw_encounter
description: Draw cards from encounter deck.

name: draw_player
description: Draw cards from player's deck.

name: draw_player_1
description: Draw cards from player's deck.

name: draw_player_2
description: Draw cards from player's deck.

name: draw_player_3
description: Draw cards from player's deck.

name: duration_until_end_phase
description: Effect duration indicator. "This phase" can also be tagged with this I think?

name: duration_until_end_round
description: Effect duration indicator.

name: duration_until_end_turn
description: Effect duration indicator.

name: effect_increase
description: Double or Nothing, Eldritch Inspiration, Grey's Anatomy (heal). Additional damage has its tag.

name: elite_reduced_effect
description: Spectral Razor

name: elite_unusable
description: Use only on non-Elite.

name: end_your_turn
description: Cause you to end your turn, like Rite of Seeking or Fated cards.

name: enemy_cannot_attack
description: Prevents enemies from attacking.

name: enemy_value_damage
description: Card that can take advantage of how many damage enemy can deal.

name: enemy_value_horror
description: Card that can take advantage of how many horror enemy can deal.

name: engage_effect
description: Grants you engages without you having to perform Engage action.

name: engage_none
description: Check if you have no engage.

name: engage_not_with_you
description: Effect related to something not engaged with you.

name: engage_with_another
description: Effect related to something engaged with others.

name: engage_with_you
description: Effect related to something engaged with you.

name: enters_play
description: Most enter play benefit are timing_reaction_enters_play. This is for rare cases like Arcane Initiate.

name: exhausted_enemy
description: Check for exhausted status of enemy.

name: exile
description: Card can exile itself somewhere in the text.

name: fast_play
description: "Fast." on assets and events.

name: gain_resource
description: For when amount gained varies.

name: give_asset
description: Can transfer asset from you to other investigator.

name: give_resource
description: Can transfer resource from you to other investigator.

name: growth
description: Related to improving the deck. Gaining XP, providing upgrade / purchase advantage, or like Adaptable / Versatile.

name: hand_check
description: Effect changes based on amount of cards in hand.

name: heal_both
description: Possible to heal both damage and horror at the same time.

name: heal_damage_ally
description: Can target selected Ally and heal out damage from it.

name: heal_damage_soak
description: Could renew itself, cannot heal others.

name: heal_horror_ally
description: Can target selected Ally and heal out horror from it.

name: heal_horror_soak
description: Could renew itself, cannot heal others.

name: immediately_play
description: Old Book of Lore 3, Ever Vigilant

name: limit_per_test_1
description: Including commit limit, or free trigger limit.

name: limit_per_test_2
description: Including commit limit, or free trigger limit.

name: limit_per_test_3
description: Including commit limit, or free trigger limit.

name: long_evade
description: When it cause enemy to not ready in the next upkeep phase.

name: move_enemy_control
description: Alters enemy course of movement.

name: move_enemy_displace
description: Move the enemy.

name: move_investigator_any
description: Effect can help moving investigators other than card's owner.

name: move_investigator_self
description: Effect can move the card's owner.

name: order_encounter
description: Can reorder encounter deck.

name: order_investigator
description: Can reorder investigator deck.

name: result_attack_success
description: Vicious Blow

name: result_test_fail
description: Something special occurs when test fails

name: result_test_success
description: Use other more specific result before this one

name: rfg_self
description: Remove self from game.

name: scenario_card
description: Card effect mentions scenario card.

name: search_encounter
description: Searches the encounter deck.

name: search_player
description: Searches the player's deck.

name: shroud_dependent
description: Effect varies depending on location's shroud value.

name: shuffle_encounter
description: Cause encounter deck to shuffle.

name: shuffle_player
description: Cause player deck to shuffle.

name: skill_another_investigator
description: Skill card that cares about another investigator (not you).

name: skill_benefit_performing
description: Test performer gets a benefit other than the commit icon.

name: skill_benefit_self
description: Skill card owner gets a benefit other than the commit icon.

name: skill_card
description: Effect works with skill card.

name: skill_gains_willpower_wild
description: Skill card gains additional commit icons in its effect.

name: soak_benefit_damage
description: Effect related to built-in health soak of that card taking damage. Not the investigator's health

name: soak_benefit_horror
description: Effect related to built-in sanity soak of that card taking horror. Not the investigator's sanity

name: stat_add_agility
description: Add this stat to the action type's stat.

name: stat_add_combat
description: Add this stat to the action type's stat.

name: stat_add_intellect
description: Add this stat to the action type's stat.

name: stat_add_willpower
description: Add this stat to the action type's stat.

name: stat_base_6
description: Card can set base stat to a specific number.

name: stat_base_agility_6
description: Card can set base stat to a specific number.

name: stat_base_combat_6
description: Card can set base stat to a specific number.

name: stat_from_spent_resource
description: Stat pump cards where you get more the more you spent.

name: stat_not_agility
description: Indicate this stat is being replaced and no longer used.

name: stat_not_combat
description: Indicate this stat is being replaced and no longer used.

name: stat_not_intellect
description: Indicate this stat is being replaced and no longer used.

name: stat_not_willpower
description: Indicate this stat is being replaced and no longer used.

name: stat_use_agility
description: Use this stat instead of something else.

name: stat_use_combat
description: Use this stat instead of something else.

name: stat_use_intellect
description: Use this stat instead of something else.

name: stat_use_optional
description: When card allow you to not replace stats too.

name: stat_use_willpower
description: Use this stat instead of something else.

name: succeed_by
description: For dynamic succeed by effect

name: succeed_by_1
description: Succeed by this amount or more.

name: succeed_by_2
description: Succeed by this amount or more.

name: succeed_by_3
description: Succeed by this amount or more.

name: succeed_by_4
description: Succeed by this amount or more.

name: succeed_by_exact_0
description: Succeed by exactly this amount for the effect to activate.

name: succeed_by_exact_1
description: Succeed by exactly this amount for the effect to activate.

name: succeed_by_exact_2
description: Succeed by exactly this amount for the effect to activate.

name: succeed_by_exact_3
description: Succeed by exactly this amount for the effect to activate.

name: succeed_by_exact_4
description: Succeed by exactly this amount for the effect to activate.

name: take_action_now
description: Such as Quick Thinking, The Stars Are Right

name: take_asset
description: Able to get asset from other players.

name: take_damage
description: Card user take damage inside the effect.

name: take_horror
description: Card user take horror inside the effect.

name: take_resource
description: Able to get resource from other players.

name: tank_damage
description: Tank means redirecting damage that would have been assigned to others to you instead.

name: tank_horror
description: Tank means redirecting horror that would have been assigned to others to you instead.

name: test_you_perform
description: Can only use with your tests.

name: testless_clue
description: Discover clue without any test.

name: testless_damage
description: Deals damage without any test.

name: testless_evade
description: Automatically evade without any test.

name: timing_fast_test
description: This is for stat pump cards. There is no condition in front of colon, but after it says "for this test".

name: timing_reaction_chaos_reveal_would
description: Effect timing related to chaos token revealing.

name: to_deck_from_discard
description: Bring back to deck from discard like Pushed to the Limit.

name: to_deck_from_play
description: Bring back to deck from play.

name: to_hand_from_commit
description: Back from commit limbo to hand.

name: to_hand_from_deck
description: Use when it says add to hand instead of "draw".

name: to_hand_from_discard
description: Take from discard to hand like Scavenging.

name: to_hand_from_play
description: Take back to hand from play like Magnifying Glass 1.

name: to_play_from_deck
description: Put into play from deck.

name: to_play_from_discard
description: Put into play from discard pile.

name: to_play_from_hand
description: Put into play from hand.

name: trait_ally
description: Card support positively to other cards of this trait.

name: trait_firearm
description: Card support positively to other cards of this trait.

name: trait_item
description: Card support positively to other cards of this trait.

name: trait_monster
description: Card support positively to other cards of this trait.

name: trait_spell
description: Card support positively to other cards of this trait.

name: trait_spell_asset
description: Card support positively to other cards of this trait.

name: trait_tome
description: Card support positively to other cards of this trait.

name: trait_tome
description: Card support positively to other cards of this trait.

name: trait_weapon
description: Card support positively to other cards of this trait.

name: unidentified
description: Card with Unidentified subtitle.

name: uses_replenish
description: Uses that replenish when a condition is met

name: your_location_ally
description: Often indicates teamplay feature.

name: your_location_enemy
description: Often let you perform testless / engage-less things.

name: your_location_investigator
description: Often indicates teamplay feature.

name: your_location_skill_test
description: Card that detects any skill test occuring at your location.

name: damage_token
description: Manipulate damage tokens, like moving them between cards.

name: horror_token
description: Manipulate horror tokens, like moving them between cards.
